title: Structure of solutions of the Skyrme model on three-sphere. Numerical results
abstract: The hedgehog Skyrme model on three-sphere admits very rich spectrum of solitonic solutions which can be encompassed by a strikingly simple scheme. The main result of this paper is the statement of the tripartite structure of solutions of the model and the discovery in what configurations these solutions appear. The model contains features of more complicated models in General Relativity and as such can give insight into them.
